49ec7b90df6159ebfce413f19e2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://64f309403b508a69e4762cb8e761be118ee5d85767a95f4543d3651bb89d1812","dweb:/ipfs/QmVdM5J3XiUtUgUkVwVkEDXBEMinLWr7zLM2g53UfDBhFK"]},"src/libraries/CookieJarLib.sol":{"keccak256":"0x02b0e80c37d8d9be61ebf1af90e1e4210187e7a56d496c04e864d87609552d39","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://ba6d5d66644f204a34c710bed8a66d2102352ea500ff03222e1f6ca7a1b59148","dweb:/ipfs/QmWgxfG5Me8WymBexbkmcXkta6fTzC3hU8FpSHJAxaDwRs"]}},"version":1}

params._feePercentage: The default fee percentage for all deposits on all vaults. Fee is calculated inside Jar contract whenever a deposit is made, according to the decimals of the currency.
params._registry: The address of the CookieJarRegistry contract.

params._cookieJarOwner: Address of the new CookieJar owner.
params._emergencyWithdrawalEnabled: If true, emergency withdrawal is enabled.
params._nftAddresses: Array of NFT contract addresses (only for NFTGated mode).
params._nftTypes: Array of NFT types corresponding to _nftAddresses.
params._strictPurpose: If true, requires a purpose length 20 characters.
params._supportedCurrency: Address of the supported currency for the jar address(3) if native ETH.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantBlacklistedJarCreatorsRole(address[.details: Restricts the ability to create new CookieJars for a given address.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

createCookieJar(address,address,uint8,ad.notice: Creates a new CookieJar contract and updates jar data in CookieJarRegistry.Currently only one currency ERC20 is supported.Creator needs to call deposit function before creating a jar, and all the funds deposited will be sent to new jar.

grantBlacklistedJarCreatorsRole(address[.notice: Update the global blacklist for an address.

grantProtocolAdminRole(address).notice: Grants the protocol admin role to a new address.

revokeProtocolAdminRole(address).notice: Revokes the protocol admin role from a given address.Only the owner can revoke the protocol admin role.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Grants owner role to a new address, and revokes previous owner with the owner role.
